summary: Full-throttle splatter-ific Japanese cyberpunk science fiction/horror at its most aggressive, this mind-blower about alien parasites that turn their human hosts into slave "Necroborgs" will leave you dizzy and drained - in a good way.
cast: Issey Takahashi|Aoba Kawai|Kenichi Kawasaki|Shôichirô Masumoto|Shôjirô Suzuki|Tôru Tezuka|Ayano Yamamoto
title: Meatball Machine
